title: Update Failed 6.22
body: I am trying to update to 6.22 but everytime I get an error message saying update failed.....help plz....

replies.body:
ok found a solution
for me i had my locale set to ko_KR
changed it to en_AU and now the error doesn't come up and lets me log in!

I have the same problem as you :(
I managed to quickly click help-repair before the error message came up again, will let you know if repair works

> [{quoted}](name=5318008,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uO58PPXt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-11T06:35:22.531+0000)
>
> I have the same problem as you :(
> I managed to quickly click help-repair before the error message came up again, will let you know if repair works

after a long time repairing, failed
Trying repairing the client upon start up using the Question mark in the top right corner, then repair client if not contact riot support
